it's been 30 years since i made this so

okay
i'm gonna follow the same pattern as in

i think that'll help it feel more

so you might notice that i'm working

i want it to have when it lands on the

order drawing the frames leading up to
that point
and that's because i want to hit that
exact point so it's easier sometimes to
start with your end drawing first and
then work your way towards it
[Music]
you'll notice my increments as the
pencil draws the lines the increments uh
they get a little bigger on each page
and that's because i want it to feel

they call that slow in and slow out or

it's funny how long this has taken me

rather than
the pencil comes into view and then

great it walked me through a series of

there was this one tiny little feature
that just totally won me over when i
uploaded my logo wix automatically asked

website template
i can't even tell you how cool that is i
hate having to enter all those little
details like color codes manually but
